prompt_inputs.goal: Marathon race day preparation - need high-carb fuel for optimal performance
prompt_inputs.restrictions: No dairy products, avoid high-fiber foods on race day

solution_criteria: Emphasizes high-carbohydrate foods throughout the day
Avoids dairy and high-fiber foods as specified
Provides structured meal timing for race day preparation
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a marathon runner needing high-carb fuel for race day preparation

prompt_inputs.goal: cutting phase while maintaining strength for powerlifting competition in 8 weeks

solution_criteria: High protein content (minimum 2g per kg bodyweight)
Caloric deficit appropriate for cutting phase
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a powerlifter requiring high-protein intake during cutting phase

solution_criteria: All meals and snacks are gluten-free and dairy-free
Includes appropriate portions for athletic performance
Covers breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a swimmer with gluten intolerance and dairy allergies

prompt_inputs.goal: maintain current performance while building lean muscle

solution_criteria: Provides adequate calories and protein for basketball player
Includes breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks

scenario: Testing with a basketball player on a tight budget ($15/day food limit)
